places.name: Idaho Military History Museum
places.description: Indoor-outdoor museum exhibiting historic military vehicles, guns, flight gear & medals.

places.name: Zoo Boise
places.description: A wide array of animal exhibits, with an African boat ride, kids' farm, butterfly area & food/drink.

places.name: The Peregrine Fund's World Center For Birds of Prey
places.address: 5668 W Flying Hawk Ln, Boise, ID 83709
places.description: Indoor/outdoor center dedicated to birds of prey, with live falcons, eagles, vultures, hawks & owls.

places.name: Barber Park
places.description: Riverfront park known for rafting has trails with wildlife views, an education center & playground.

places.name: Old Idaho Penitentiary Site
places.description: 1872 prison features 30 historic buildings with special exhibitions & self-guided walking tours.

places.name: Habituehomes-East End Retreat Hot Springs Pool Boise
places.description: This charming 2-bedroom, 1-bath home in Boise's Historic East End features a private hot spring soaking pool with a complimentary 2-hour soak.

places.name: Idaho Botanical Garden
places.address: 2355 N Old Penitentiary Rd, Boise, ID 83712
places.description: Year-round living museum with self-guided tours through 33 acres of unique native & exotic gardens.

places.name: Discovery Center of Idaho
places.description: Kid-friendly science museum featuring interactive exhibits explaining complex ideas.
